images.name: Windows 11 ARM
images.description: This will install Windows 11 ARM64 on a Parallels VM using automated Packer scripts.

isoHelp.prefixText: Please follow the instructions on the
isoHelp.suffixText: to download the Windows 11 ARM64 ISO

images.name: Generic Iso
images.description: You can use this to install any compatible Linux distro using the arm64 ISO.

images.name: Redhat 9.2
images.description: This will create a Redhat 9.2 VM, you will need to source the ISO and will need user input to complete the installation.

isoHelp.suffixText: for arm64, please make sure you download the correct version
